trends: There have been no other sightings in Albany Creek
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details1:) At a mates house, heading towards backyard, whilst approaching the back screen door I a happened to notice the object. 2:) Strange object in the sky, completely unusual to see, not a conventional vehicle or anything known to be operated to human knowledge. 3:) Either Military re-engineered downed spacecraft, or Alien craft. 4:) Stationary when I noticed it and after capturing image of it on my iPod touch, when trying to change to video capture mode the object took off at incredible speeds. Nothing to what I know any of the current machines man possesses is capable of. 4: Stunned, unsure of whether seeing such a thing was really happening, as I know now, that isn't the case. 5:) It took off at enormous speeds straight up into the sky.
